entity.name: Hillary Clinton
entity.description: Former First Lady of the United States Hillary Clinton

text:
@realDonaldTrump It’s funny how Trump insists up and down that he never claimed the Coronavirus was a hoax, yet in a CRAZY coincidence the only people participating in the protests against Coronavirus prevention are all foaming-at-the-mouth Trumpers.

(See also: “Hillary was the first Birther”)
